changeSet.id: create reference data - self help guide
changeSet.author: jon.adams

column.name: name
column.value: Student Success Course

column.name: description
column.value: SCC 101 - Student success course self help guide.

column.name: introductory_text
column.value: Welcome to the MyGPS guide for SCC 101. This course, aided by MyGPS, will help you navigate your pathway to sucess at Sinclair. On the following screens, you will be asked a series of questions concerning typical roadblocks faced by many students. After submiting your answers, resources will be presented as possible solutions. You will then have an oportunity to select resources that create your Personal Road Map.

column.name: summary_text
column.value: Thank you for using MyGPS! Hopefully you found this guide and your Personal Road Map helpful and informative. If you have questions about this guide, the resources, your map, or have other counseling or advising questions, please contact your SCC 101 instructor.

column.name: summary_text_early_alert
column.value: Due to your answers for the self help guide we have sent an early alert on your behalf to the counseling and advising staff. They will be contacting you to discuss various options to deal with the challenges you are facing.

column.name: summary_text_threshold
column.value: Due to your answers for the self help guide we have sent an early alert on your behalf to the counseling and advising staff. They will be contacting you to discuss various options to deal with the challenges you are facing.

column.name: name
column.value: Traveling Your Career Path

column.name: description
column.value: A listing of resources for making the most out of your future career.

column.name: introductory_text
column.value: Welcome to the Traveling Your Career Path self-help guide. Aided by MyGPS, you will navigate your pathway to a successful career. On the following screens, you will be asked a series of questions concerning career issues faced by many students. After submitting your answers, resources will be presented as possible solutions. You will then have an opportunity to select resources that create your Personal Career Road Map.

column.name: name
column.value: A Quick-Start Guide to Sinclair

column.name: description
column.value: A guide for new students immediately after testing.

column.name: introductory_text
column.value: Welcome to the Quick Start to Sinclair self-help guide. Aided by MyGPS, you will navigate your pathway to a successful start at Sinclair. On the following screens, you will be asked a series of questions concerning typical roadblocks faced by many students. After submitting your answers, resources will be presented as possible solutions. You will then have an opportunity to select resources that create your Personal Road Map.

column.name: name
column.value: Navigating Academic Success

column.name: description
column.value: Navigating Academic Success - The Next Step

column.name: introductory_text
column.value: Welcome to the Navigating Academic Success self-help guide. Aided by MyGPS, you will navigate your pathway to success at Sinclair. On the following screens, you will be asked a series of questions concerning typical roadblocks faced by many students. After submitting your answers, resources will be presented as possible solutions. You will then have an opportunity to select resources that create your Personal Road Map.

column.name: summary_text
column.value: Thank you for using MyGPS! Hopefully you found this guide and your Personal Road Map helpful and informative. If you have questions about this guide, the resources, your map, or any other topics discussed, please contact your advisor or counselor.

column.name: summary_text_early_alert
column.value: Due to your answers for the self help guide we have sent an early alert on your behalf to the counseling and advising staff. They will be contacting you to discuss various options to deal with the challenges you are facing.

column.name: summary_text_threshold
column.value: Due to your answers for the self help guide we have sent an early alert on your behalf to the counseling and advising staff. They will be contacting you to discuss various options to deal with the challenges you are facing.

column.name: name
column.value: Resources for Academic Intervention

column.name: description
column.value: A guide for students on academic intervention.

column.name: introductory_text
column.value: Welcome to Academic Intervention self-help guide. Aided by MyGPS, you will navigate your pathway to success at Sinclair. On the following screens, you will be asked a series of questions concerning typical roadblocks faced by many students. After submitting your answers, resources will be presented as possible solutions. You will then have an opportunity to select resources that create your Personal Road Map. After completion please mail to: counselingsvcs@sinclair.edu

column.name: self_help_guide_description
column.value: Child or adult care demands often pose challenges for success in college. It is important to develop a plan to address these challenges before they become barriers to your academic success.

column.name: self_help_guide_question
column.value: Could my child or adult care cause me to be absent from class or fail to complete assignments?

column.name: self_help_guide_description
column.value: Instructors expect students to be in class, on time, every time. Being late or missing just one class forces you to play catch-up and can negatively affect your grades.

column.name: self_help_guide_question
column.value: Do I have transportation issues that could cause me to be late or miss class?

column.name: self_help_guide_description
column.value: Email, not post office mail, is the number one means of communication by the College with students. Basic computer skills to access your email and web advisor tools are required for all new students even before classes begin.

column.name: self_help_guide_question
column.value: Does my lack of computer skills keep me from fully participating in class and college activities?

column.name: self_help_guide_description
column.value: Test self-help guide description.

column.name: self_help_guide_question
column.value: Test self-help guide question?

column.name: self_help_guide_description
column.value: Educational and social support is provided through the office of ESL/Enrollment Services. Students who speak English as a second language are encouraged to seek assistance from the ESL coordinator.

column.name: self_help_guide_question
column.value: Would I like to learn more about services available to ESL students?
